section.name: Filter and map reads step
section.p: This step combine in one step in hadoop mode the filtering of the reads, the mapping and the filtering of the alignments. This step only available in hadoop mode is more efficent than using the 3 steps successively.

ul.li: Input: Fastq or tfq file (tfq files are tabuleted fastq files with one read by line used in hadoop mode).
Output: filtered alignment file in SAM format (e.g. filtered_mapper_results_1.sam).

tr.td: The threshold for the length of the reads. Unit in bases.
The threshold for the mean base quality. Unit in decimal quality score.
The name of the mapper to use
None, this parameter is mandatory. (e.g. bowtie, bwa, soap).
Threshold for the mapping quality. An integer between [0-255].

section.p: For the list of the available built-in mappers and default arguments, see the Map reads step page.
